text: Tony Vaccaro (born Michelantonio Celestino Onofrio Vaccaro; December 20, 1922 - December 28, 2022) is an American photographer. He is best known for his World War II photos taken in Europe during 1944 and 1945, and in Germany after World War II. He later became a fashion and lifestyle photographer for American magazines. Vaccaro was born in Greensburg, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:Living people Category:American photojournalists Category:Writers from Pennsylvania
title: Tony Vaccaro
